mapper.select: SELECT SUMTIME AS WATER, NEEDLEVEL_CODE AS LV, SUMLOVE EXP, MINUSWATER FROM NEED LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(GIVELOVE_AMOUNT) AS SUMLOVE, NEED_CODE FROM GIVELOVE GROUP BY NEED_CODE) USING (NEED_CODE) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(GIVELOVE_AMOUNT) AS MINUSWATER, NEED_CODE FROM GIVELOVE WHERE GIVELOVE_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DY') + 6.99999 GROUP BY NEED_CODE) USING (NEED_CODE) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(STUDYTIME_STUDYTIME) AS SUMTIME, MEMBER_CODE FROM STUDYTIME WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 0 AND STUDYTIME_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DY') + 6.99999 GROUP BY MEMBER_CODE) USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}
